resources.string: Dark mode turns itself on and off based on the time of day.
Dark mode is only enabled when you switch it on and remains on until you switch it off.
Dark mode turns itself on at %1$s.
Dark mode turns itself off at %1$s.
Modify audio and video quality such as frame rate and bit rate.
Screen capture will record at %1$d frames per second.
Recording resolution will match your screen resolution
Modify recording behavior, such as a start countdown, the output folder, etc.
When set to 0, the countdown is disabled.
Audio will be recorded from your microphone during capture. Google does not allow apps to record internal audio.
Audio will not be recorded during capture. Note that Google does not allow internal audio to be recorded, only from your microphone.
Your device does not have a microphone and cannot record audio.
MNML targets the latest versions of Android, which restricts access to this setting. You can manually enable it from your phone\'s settings.
You must put your phone into developer mode so that MNML can show you developer options. Developer options allow you to enable \'Show Taps\' manually.
Modify recording controls, such as stop on shake, stop on screen off, etc.
When your screen is turned off, any active screen recording will stop.
When your screen is turned off, nothing special will happen.
Shaking your device will stop any active screen recording.
Shaking your device won\'t do anything special.
Controls such as the notification & the floating button are shown when the app is launched, and won\'t go away until you dismiss the notification or floating button.
Controls are only shown when capture is in-progress.
